name: Huachinango a La Plancha (Grilled Red Snapper)
author: Chef Rick
summary: Fish grilled in this manner is a specialty in the palm-roofed beach restaurants of Barra Vieja, on the outskirts of Acapulco. It is cooked on a wood-fired grill or plancha (griddle).
directions: Combine mayonnaise, lime juice, salt, and black pepper in a bowl
Rub mixture evenly onto the fillets and place them on a plate
Marinate in the refrigerator for 40 minutes
Preheat an outdoor grill or griddle for medium heat and lightly grease
Place fillets on the cooking surface for 30 seconds
Turn over and continue to cook until opaque and cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes
